allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add text customization controls (Phase 2 complete)

Implemented 3D text rendering on the mug with customization options:
- Text input field with 30 character limit and counter
- Text size slider (0.5x to 2.0x scaling)
- Text color picker with 5 preset colors
- Real-time 3D text rendering using troika-three-text
- Improved text visibility (larger base size, white default color)

Note: Font selector was excluded as troika-three-text requires font file URLs, not font names.
